description.original: An Obsidian plugin that allows hiding files and folders in the built-in file explorer
description.translation: An Obsidian plugin that allows hiding files and folders in the built-in file explorer

dict..setDesc(`Toggle whether or not files an: .setDesc(`Toggle whether or not files and folders that are told to be hidden will be hidden or not.`)
dict..setDesc(`Add or remove files and folder: .setDesc(`Add or remove files and folders from the list that are being hidden`)
